title: Timeline of Homicides that occurred the weekend of March 30- April 1, 2012
body:
(1)  FRIDAY, March 30th at 9:46 PM                                                                                       1600
block of BRIGHTSEAT ROAD in LANDOVER 17 year-old Brandon Lee WIGGINS of Capitol
Heightskilled during a gun battle with another
armed gunman in an apartment complex parking lot.Potentially a drug related robbery or
dispute of some sort.We have identified the shooter and
anticipate closing this investigation shortly. (2)  SATURDAY, March 31st at 1:21 AM2000 block of WOODBERRY STREET in LEWISDALE19 year-old Lester Flores QUINTANILLA of
Alexandria, Virginiashot and killed during a possible robbery
attempt while walking with 2 other males in a residential community.Suspects are described only as 2 males
armed with handguns.Our victim is affiliated with the gang
MS-13. This investigation remains ACTIVE. (3)  SATURDAY, March 31st at 7:18 PM3500 block of TERRACE DRIVE in SUITLAND25 year-old Ashley McCLURKIN of Suitland
shot & killed by 24 year-old Audrea BLACKWELL of  the 700 block of Fairlawn Street, Temple
Hills inside of McClurkin’s apartment.Audrea Blackwell was arrested on Sunday.
(PHOTO AVAILALBLE UPON REQUEST)The shooting stemmed from a . (4)  SUNDAY, April 1 at 4:25 AM4100 block of DANVILLE ROAD in ACCOKEEK
83 year-old Dorothy OGDEN  was shot and killed in her single-family
residence by her granddaughter, 32 year-old Cristalina WARNER .They lived in the home together.  The shooting stemmed from a .Cristalina Warner was arrested on Sunday.
(PHOTO AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST)(5)  SUNDAY, April 1st at 8:19 AM2700 block of JUDITH AVENUE in DISTRICT
HEIGHTS21 year-old David SHAW of Forestville
produced a handgun and announced a robbery at a residential home occupied by 6
persons.  Shaw and the victims are all
known to each other.SHAW then shot one of the male robbery
victims in the leg, prompting another male robbery victim to jump him in an
effort to wrestle the gun away.The gun is eventually taken from SHAW
during the struggle.The now armed robbery victim next SHOOTS
& KILLS SHAW. Homicide detectives and the State’s
Attorney’s Office will review the circumstances to determine if the shooting is
a  .TIMELINE OF  THAT OCCURRED THE WEEKEND OF MARCH 30-APRIL 1,
2012FRIDAY at 10:11 PM6700 block of NORTHWEST DRIVE in Triple shooting in apartment complex
community.All injuries are non-life threatening.Dispute stemmed from an argument.  The suspect and victims are all known to
each other.  The shooter has been identified and we
anticipate an ARREST soon.SUNDAY at 11:31 AM2500 block of AFTON Street in SHOOTING/ ROBBERY ATTEMPT. Non-life threatening injuries.No one in custody.  Active investigation We anticipate an arrest soon.
